div.div: REQUEST A TOURWe are pleased to provide personal tours, enabling you to visit our schools in Michigan when it is most convenient. We look forward to meeting you and your children!WE LOVE BLOOMFIELD!We are unable to count the reasons why people love Bloomfield! Learn just some of the reasons families move to our neighborhoods and send their children to our Michigan public schools.

CurriculumOpportunities abound for students in Bloomfield Hills Schools. Academic excellence is a tradition in our schools.
Bloomfield Hills High SchoolOur new campus houses Bloomfield Hills High School. Our high school in Michigan serves grades 9-12, provides a permanent facility on-site for Model Center, and offers highly collaborative and technical learning spaces for our high school students.

Data Dashboard Our data dashboard highlights measurable components in multiple areas in order to ensure a high quality school system. The data presented provides a holistic view of our school district.

Learning ServicesThe Learning Services team works with teachers and principals on the areas of teaching and learning. They coordinate all curriculum areas including instructional strategies and assessment.
Special EducationFrom our exceptional D/HH program, to Wing Lake Developmental Center's warm and welcoming environment, BHS is proud of the myriad of services we offer special education students.

BHS Alumni Friends and teachers reunite to celebrate the legacy of Bloomfield Hills Schools, as one of the best public school districts in Michigan. Connect with BHS! There are always a lot of amazing things happening at Bloomfield Hills Schools! Stay informed and up to date by receiving our email news- Sign up by clicking the link above. article.h2: Bloomfield Hills Schools Continuous Learning Plan 2.0

div.p: Our Continuous Learning Plan began Monday, April 13, 2020. Please use an internet-enabled device to navigate to www.bloomfield.org/learn. This page serves as the hub for all teaching and learning online for all grade levels for the remainder of this school year.

As you will see, the page is grouped by grade level in order to provide quick and easy navigation to all teaching and learning content. We have also provided some health and emotional wellness resources, video content, and other information that we hope you will find useful as we progress along in this new environment.

Teachers may continue to use the tools used previously to supplement the website. These tools may include Google Classroom, class pages or websites, standard email, notification systems, and Google Meet. Students will receive instructions and information from teachers regarding how to access these tools prior to needing them, especially if they are new tools to the classroom. Please be mindful that, at this time, we are strongly discouraging the use of Zoom given the issues Zoom is experiencing.
If you have difficulties navigating to this page or accessing content for the Continuous Learning Plan, please email bhstech@bloomfield.org or call 248.900.2470.
View the presentation to the Board of Education from 4/2/20 to see more details including sample schedules.

ul.li: One school district, three distinct programs to meet the needs of our students
Daily teacher-led instruction by our highly qualified staff, 75% of our staff have earned a Master's Degree or higher

Small online class sizes to best meet the needs of our students, with average class sizes of:
22 students for K-5
26 students for 6-8
25-27 students for 9-12
Our Continuous Learning Plan was benchmarked against school districts in 17 states
